trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property, field, or parameter value should be provided by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" />.object
trans-unit.target: 指定属性、字段或参数值应由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 对象提供。

trans-unit.source: In the Attributed Programming Model, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute> is used to declare the imports, or dependencies, of a given part.
trans-unit.target: 在特性化编程模型中，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>用于声明导入或给定部分的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: It can decorate a property, a field, or a method.
trans-unit.target: 它可以修饰属性、 字段或方法。

trans-unit.source: During composition, a part's imports will be filled by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> object to which that part belongs, by using the exports provided to that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> object.
trans-unit.target: 组合，期间部件的导入将由填写<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>该段所属，通过使用所提供的导出对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>对象。

trans-unit.source: Whether an import matches a given export is determined primarily by comparing the contract name and the contract type.
trans-unit.target: 导入是否与给定的导出匹配由主要通过比较协定名称和协定类型。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, you do not have to specify either of these when using the import attribute in code, and they will be automatically inferred from the type of the decorated member.
trans-unit.target: 通常，则不需要在代码中，使用导入属性时指定任何一种方法，并且它们将自动从推断出修饰的成员的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the import must match an export of a different type (for example, a subclass of the type of the decorated member, or an interface implemented by that member), then the contract type must be explicitly specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果导入必须匹配的不同类型 （例如，经过修饰的成员或该成员由实现的接口的类型的一个子类） 导出，然后协定必须显式指定类型。

trans-unit.source: The contract name can also be explicitly specified, for example to distinguish between multiple contracts with the same type, but it is usually better to do this through metadata.
trans-unit.target: 协定名称可以还显式指定，例如来区分多个协定类型相同，但通常最好通过元数据执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about metadata, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartMetadataAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 有关元数据的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartMetadataAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows three classes with members decorated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>, and three exports that match them.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示三个类与成员使用修饰<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>，并且其匹配的三个导出。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> class, importing the export with the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: 通过导入具有默认协定名称的导出，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property, field, or parameter type that this is marked with this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 默认协定名称是调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>上这使用此特性标记的属性、 字段或参数类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用比较协定名称<xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>属性来执行区分大小写、 非语言比较。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the export to import, or <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: 要导入的导出结果的协定名称，或 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串 ("") 以使用默认协定名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> class, importing the export with the specified contract name.
trans-unit.target: 通过导入具有指定协定名称的导出，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property, field, or parameter type that is marked with this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 默认协定名称是调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>上使用此特性标记的属性、 字段或参数类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用比较协定名称<xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>属性来执行区分大小写、 非语言比较。

trans-unit.source: The type to derive the contract name of the export from, or <see langword="null" /> to use the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: 要从中派生导出的协定名称的类型，或 <see langword="null" /> 以使用默认协定名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> class, importing the export with the contract name derived from the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 通过导入具有派生自指定类型的协定名称的导出，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on `contractType`.
trans-unit.target: 协定名称是调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>方法`contractType`。

trans-unit.source: The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property, field, or parameter type that is marked with this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 默认协定名称是调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>上使用此特性标记的属性、 字段或参数类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用比较协定名称<xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>属性来执行区分大小写、 非语言比较。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the export to import, or <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: 要导入的导出结果的协定名称，或 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串 ("") 以使用默认协定名称。

trans-unit.source: The type of the export to import.
trans-unit.target: 要导入的导出结果的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> class, importing the export with the specified contract name and type.
trans-unit.target: 通过导入具有指定协定名称和类型的导出，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the property, field, or parameter will be set to its type's default value when an export with the contract name is not present in the container.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在容器中不存在具有协定名称的导出时，是否将属性、字段或参数设置为其类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property, field, or parameter will be set to its type's default value when there is no export with the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.ContractName" /> in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.ContractName" /> 中不存在具有 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 的导出时，将属性、字段或参数设置为其类型的默认值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the type of a property, field, or parameter is `null` for reference types and zero for numeric value types.
trans-unit.target: 属性、 字段或参数的类型的默认值是`null`为引用类型，对于数值类型为零。

trans-unit.source: For other value types, the default value will be each field of the value type initialized to zero if the field is a value type, or `null` if the field is a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他值类型，默认值将初始化为零，如果字段为值类型，值类型的每个字段或`null`域是否是引用类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the property or field will be recomposed when exports with a matching contract have changed in the container.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在容器中具有匹配协定的导出发生更改时，是否将重新组合属性或字段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property or field allows recomposition when exports with a matching <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.ContractName" /> are added or removed from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.ContractName" /> 中添加或移除具有匹配的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 的导出时，允许重新组合属性或字段，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the contract name of the export to import.
trans-unit.target: 获取要导入的导出结果的协定名称。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the export to import.
trans-unit.target: 要导入的导出结果的协定名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the export to import.
trans-unit.target: 获取要导入的导出结果的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the export to import.
trans-unit.target: 要导入的导出结果的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the importer requires a specific <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> for the exports used to satisfy this import.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示导入程序需要导出结果的特定 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />，以满足此导入。

trans-unit.source: One of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 以下值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" />, if the importer does not require a specific <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果导入程序不需要特定 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认设置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" /> to require that all used exports be shared by all parts in the container.
trans-unit.target: 若要求容器中的所有部件共享所有已使用的导出，则为 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" /> to require that all used exports be non-shared in a container.
trans-unit.target: 若要求所有已使用的导出在容器中不共享，则为 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, each part receives their own instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，每个部件都会收到各自的实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the scopes from which this import may be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定可能满足此导出的域的值。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the scopes from which this import may be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 指定可能满足此导入范围的值。
